summary: FlashTrend is a fast, lightweight short news application delivering viral updates, political news, and trending stories in an easy-to-read format with real-time coverage and social sharing capabilities.
architectural_notes: News content should be optimized for quick reading with short summaries
Real-time data fetching mechanism required for viral and trending stories
Performance optimization is critical for fast loading experience
Push notification system needed for breaking news alerts
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern lightning bolt logo icon in energetic colors for FlashTrend brand identity (flashtrend-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Abstract dynamic wave pattern background suggesting speed and movement in warm gradient colors (hero-background.dim_1920x400.png)
- Set of 4 small category icons: megaphone for politics, fire for viral, trending arrow, and speech bubble for social in matching style (category-politics.dim_64x64.png, category-viral.dim_64x64.png, category-trending.dim_64x64.png, category-social.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a main news feed page displaying news articles in card format with title, summary, category badge, timestamp, and share count
Add category filter tabs (All, Politics, Viral, Trending, Social) at the top of the news feed that filter displayed articles
Implement infinite scroll or pagination controls for the news feed to load articles 10 at a time
Add a share button to each news card that copies the article summary and title to clipboard and increments the share count

Design a distinctive visual theme with bold typography, bright accent colors (avoiding blue and purple), and card-based layouts that convey speed and modernity appropriate for a fast-paced news application
Create an admin interface for adding new news articles with fields for title, summary (with 280 character limit), category selection, and source

new_feature_requests.summary: Display short and easy-to-read news updates
Show latest political and social trending topics
Implement clean and modern user interface
Ensure fast loading and smooth performance
Add push notifications for breaking updates
Enable easy sharing option for social media
Create a backend data model for news articles with fields: id, title, summary (short text limited to 280 characters), category (politics, viral, trending, social), timestamp, source, and shareCount
Implement backend methods to create, read, update, and delete news articles with pagination support (10 articles per page)
Add backend method to filter news articles by category (politics, viral, trending, social)
Implement backend method to increment shareCount when a news article is shared
